full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Enterprise Resource Planning System Analyst

## Advertisement Details

*   **Solicitation Reference**: 23-232857
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Limited Tendering
*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **GSGIN**: R019 Other Professional Services
*   **Trade Agreements**: WTO GPA, CCFTA, AIT, CPFTA, CColFTA, and CPanFTA

## Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority**: Houssam Hannat
*   **Contact Email**: <houssam.hannat@international.gc.ca>
*   **Contact Phone**: 343-203-5473

## Description of Work

Global Affairs Canada requires the services of an Enterprise Resource Planning System Analyst to design, architecture, and configuration of a secure global communications platform.

## Eligible Contractors

This RFP is open to expiry. Only TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories are eligible to submit a proposal:

*   **Stream 1**: Application Services; A.4. Enterprise Resource Planning System Analyst

## Submission Requirements

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Method of Supply

The TBIPS method of supply is refreshed three times a year. If you wish to become a "Qualified SA Holder", please contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca
